OOC: Just to let you know, I never disapeared, Scorponoks still there, and
Kinger, you should at least give us chance to react, that is how and RPG
shuld be. I wouldnt care if I died, but I would at least like a chance.

BIC:
Scorponok followed Megatron closely, "I, I had no Idea my lord" he speaks
squeemishly, as he helped Megatron's troops bomb the wall, he kept up with
them until outside.
